name: Locked in a Bunker
description:
Escape the bunker. Find the key, find the vault.

You hided in a bunker when a nuke hit your city, Ravengton. A lot of time after the nuke hit, you wake up in the bunker with no one else.

The victory and main menu songs belong to Damjan Mravunac and Croteam.

Made in FPS Creator Classic.

Nostalgia when I made games in FPSC and posted them nowhere XD

"Fallout thing? Maybe. The bunker is not very big, which means it's very easy to escape.

Graphics: 5/10

Gameplay: 9/10

A good 3-star game."

                                                                                                                                         -GameTime
